original_text: And Aaron shall bring the goat upon which the Lord's lot fell, and offer him for a sin offering.
korean_text: 아론은 여호와를 위하여 제비 뽑은 염소를 속죄제로 드리고

sentences.original_text: And Aaron shall bring the goat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아론은 그 염소를 가져와야 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: upon which the Lord's lot fell
and offer him for a sin offering
